meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a yokel.
meanings.sent1: The yokelish man wore overalls and a straw hat.
meanings.sent2: Her yokelish accent reminded me of the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The yokelish dog chased after the chickens in the yard.
meanings.sent4: The old barn had a yokelish charm that was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The yokelish landscape was dotted with farms and fields.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a manner typical of a yokel.
meanings.sent1: He had a yokelish way of speaking that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: Their yokelish antics at the fair entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The yokelish dance they performed was both funny and charming.
meanings.sent4: She had a yokelish habit of waving at passing cars.
meanings.sent5: The yokelish behavior of the group was infectious and joyful.
